info.name: Self Progress Tracking Service - 30-Day Learning Journey
info.description: A comprehensive collection that simulates a user's learning journey over a 30-day period using the Self Progress Tracking Service. The collection demonstrates realistic usage patterns including high productivity days, moderate progress days, and days with little to no activity.

item.name: Setup
item.description: Initial setup requests for user registration, email verification, and login

request.description: Register a new user for the 30-day learning journey

query.description: The verification token received via email

request.description: Verify the user's email address using the token received via email. Note: In a real scenario, you would need to extract this token from the email. For testing purposes, you can set this as an environment variable manually.
Login to get JWT tokens for authentication

item.name: Create Full Stack Web Development Syllabus

request.description: Create the main syllabus for the 30-day learning journey
Create the first subject in the syllabus
Create the second subject in the syllabus
Create the third subject in the syllabus
Create the fourth subject in the syllabus
Create the first topic for HTML & CSS Fundamentals
Create the second topic for HTML & CSS Fundamentals
Create the third topic for HTML & CSS Fundamentals
Create the first subtopic for HTML Basics
Create the second subtopic for HTML Basics

item.name: Week 1
item.description: First week of the learning journey (Days 1-7)

item.name: Day 1
item.description: First day of learning - Getting started with HTML

body.raw:
{
    "itemId": "{{subtopic1Id}}",
    "itemType": "SUBTOPIC",
    "date": "{{$isoDatetime iso8601 0}}",
    "status": "IN_PROGRESS",
    "timeSpentMinutes": 45,
    "notes": "Started learning about HTML document structure. Understood DOCTYPE declaration and basic HTML skeleton."
}
